Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Southbound Reroute near Van Buren/Wacker
ShortDescription: SB 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Wacker Drive, Adams, and Clinton due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Wacker Drive, Adams, and Clinton due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Wacker.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
